name: GenericValidator_maxLengthTest
description: Unit tests for the maxLength method in GenericValidator.

test_cases.name: testMaxLength_WithinLimit
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLength method with a string that is within the limit.

test_cases.name: testMaxLength_ExceedsLimit
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLength method with a string that exceeds the limit.

test_cases.name: testMaxLength_NoLineEndings
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLength method with a string that has no line endings.

test_cases.name: testMaxLength_EmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLength method with an empty string.

test_cases.name: testMaxLength_ExactlyAtLimit
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLength method with a string that is exactly at the limit.
